name: gcr.io/oss-fuzz/test-project
args:
rm -r /out && cd /src && cd /src && mkdir -p /workspace/out/afl-address-x86_64 && compile || (echo "********************************************************************************
Failed to build.
To reproduce, run:
python infra/helper.py build_image test-project
python infra/helper.py build_fuzzers --sanitizer address --engine afl --architecture x86_64 test-project
********************************************************************************" && false)

name: gcr.io/oss-fuzz-base/base-runner
args:
test_all.py || (echo "********************************************************************************
Build checks failed.
To reproduce, run:
python infra/helper.py build_image test-project
python infra/helper.py build_fuzzers --sanitizer address --engine afl --architecture x86_64 test-project
python infra/helper.py check_build --sanitizer address --engine afl --architecture x86_64 test-project
********************************************************************************" && false)
